name: In re Christopher Scott WALTERS. Appeal of Martin V. and Linda A. MYERS

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
parties: In re Christopher Scott WALTERS. Appeal of Martin V. and Linda A. MYERS.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed.
Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John F. Pyfer, Jr., Lancaster, for appellant.
Richard S. Solove, Lancaster, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
411 A.2d 216
In re Christopher Scott WALTERS. Appeal of Martin V. and Linda A. MYERS.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 21, 1980.
Decided Feb. 25, 1980.
John F. Pyfer, Jr., Lancaster, for appellant.
Richard S. Solove, Lancaster, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
